## trace variable

Returns matrix trace of `m`<!-- -->, i.e. component sum of `diag(m)`<!-- -->.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
trace: (m: import("@thi.ng/api").ArrayLikeIterable<number>) => number
```
